7973075212bc.name: Brandon Anderson

paragraphs.text: In last season’s playoffs, George nearly single-handedly knocked out a 56-win team in the first round. He averaged 27.3 points (on 45.5 percent shooting), 7.6 rebounds, and 4.3 assists against the Raptors, taking his game to a completely different level than in the regular season. George has gotten the better of LeBron at points in their three playoff matchups when James was in Miami, but he has never been able to get past him in a series. While the Pacers almost certainly aren’t good enough to knock off the Cavs, George can make a statement about his place in the NBA hierarchy with a strong showing against LeBron. Barring an unlikely playoff run by Giannis Antetokounmpo or Jimmy Butler, George is the best wing LeBron will face until a possible Finals series against Kevin Durant. That alone should get his competitive juices flowing. There’s no more rationing energy or saving himself. The best player in the world is squaring off against a legitimate challenger to the throne.

virtuals.metaDescription: Getting LeBron James and Paul George in the opening game of the postseason is almost too good to be true
virtuals.subtitle: Getting LeBron James and Paul George in the opening game of the postseason is almost too good to be true

4865e49679cc.title: I think Mike Conley vs Tony Parker/Patty Mills gets honorable mention, because I’m assuming that’s…

paragraphs.name: 1ead
paragraphs.text: I think Mike Conley vs Tony Parker/Patty Mills gets honorable mention, because I’m assuming that’s the primary reason some TV personalities are peaking Spurs vs Grizzles to be a long series. While Memphis did upset them in 2011, the Spurs swept them in their last 2 playoff matchups by simply packing the paint and daring them to shoot 3’s.

206ce90e55c.title: LOL I love you for the Jimmy Eat World throwback.

paragraphs.text: LOL I love you for the Jimmy Eat World throwback. It’s been a very long time, whoa ohh-oh-oh-o-ohh. Bonus points for not making Russ vs Harden one of the five too.

ef372737ee77.title: I’m surprised more people haven’t suggested Ariza on Westbrook.

paragraphs.name: 1c3e
paragraphs.text: I’m surprised more people haven’t suggested Ariza on Westbrook. It seems like having 2 great defenders sharing the assignment is a lot better than demanding what would be an insane effort from Beverly.

cb09ba00c2ab.title: I’m glad the inevitable Gobert vs.

paragraphs.name: 3eef
paragraphs.text: I’m glad the inevitable Gobert vs. DJ slugfest got some love. Another one in that same game that could be fun is Hill vs. CP3.

paragraphs.text: You just know Isaiah Thomas is going to demand to cover Jimmy Butler because somebody suggested he wouldn’t be able to.

b6018b4590d3.title: I would also like to nominate IT vs.

paragraphs.name: 99ac
paragraphs.text: I would also like to nominate IT vs. the forest. Probably the biggest question mark for that series is whether the Bulls can slow him down on one end and exploit him on the other.

3e30b177512d.title: Even though they aren’t matching up position-wise I’m looking forward to the former teammates & MVP…

paragraphs.name: 9b8e
paragraphs.text: Even though they aren’t matching up position-wise I’m looking forward to the former teammates & MVP frontrunners: Westbrook & Harden.

ce07e514bbea.title: and defensively, he also ruined Demar Derozan’s life for 7 games.
